channel.title: BeyondUnreal Forums
channel.description: Forums for Unreal, Unreal Tournament, and Unreal Engine discussion

item.title: Can you guess the name of the map?
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Inspired from another forum...
Dr.Flay said:
Grins don't just post more screenshots, or we may as well create another (separate) "What are these ?" thread.
Click to expand...
...and, now, here we all are.

Seeing as I'm usually on here once a day, this should work okay.

Rules:
· Only maps for the original (ut99) Unreal Tournament.
· 1 map post at a time, with a couple screenshots (no more than 3, no less than 2).
· Try to keep your guesses down to 1 or 2.
· After whoever posted the...

Can you guess the name of the map?

item.title: Recommendations for a new pc
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNite)
item.dc:creator: NeoNite
item.content:encoded:
So I'll be compiling a new system, probably this month. Perhaps in January, but preferably this year.

Basically I'll be looking for a new mobo, processor, ram, gpu, psu, hdd (solid state drives f.e and backup.) and a case.
What I have in mind is a pretty powerfull machine. I want to try some of the recent games, but the main purpose will be graphics editing. I need lots and lots of memory. I've bought a graphics tablet (wacom bamboo) a while ago and want to enjoy it to the fullest extent....

Recommendations for a new pc

item.title: Stratus: Battle for the sky early access steam
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
After much tweaking to get the lobby pretty much stable for logging on and joining MP games Stratus has gone on Early access on steam...

http://store.steampowered.com/app/355490

Build is still basic and has issues but we have been rolling out patches in the past few week that started to add more functionality to the gui such as hot keys for bridges and buildings and new health bars for units and buildings. we still are resolving a resource collector pathing issue and aiming to...

Stratus: Battle for the sky early access steam

item.title: Holy crap I've been here over 15 years....
item.author: invalid@example.com (DRT-Maverick)
item.dc:creator: DRT-Maverick
item.content:encoded: Yeah, and can you believe Unreal98 is coming up on its 18th anniversary in spring of 2016? Two years from a 20 year old game. Does it feel that old? It doesn't feel like it's been that much time.

item.title: So... I just got phone phished.
item.author: invalid@example.com (thewalkingbread)
item.dc:creator: thewalkingbread
item.content:encoded:
Well, they tried to at least.

The scammers called me and said they were from my bank, and asked me to log into my bank account to check some unusual activity. A little odd, but not so crazy.

So I said i would, but then hung up. Then called up the fraud department from my bank, and asked if someone had just called me regarding my account. They didn't know anything of it, and said it was likely a scammer.

Has anyone ever had this? It was new to me.

item.title: Rate the Last Movie You Watched
item.author: invalid@example.com (Manticore)
item.dc:creator: Manticore
item.content:encoded:
Since it looks like the original thread has disappeared:

Someone asked me before the crash whether I saw the theatrical or uncut version of Die Hard 4.0:

It was the uncut version but it was still pretty much what I expected to see. 6.5/10

I Am Legend-8/10. I'm rating this highly not because it is the best futuristic story told on film or because it is "Omega Man" on steroids but because, in my opinion, this is one of the best performances I have seen Will Smith deliver.

I haven't...

Rate the Last Movie You Watched

item.title: Peace in our time!
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Has anyone ever stopped to consider that the main reason there's such conflict between humans & Skaarj is that we call them monsters? I mean, they're really just aliens. Non-human beings from other planets.

Nobody calls Superman a monster... well, nobody that isn't Lex Luthor.

Sure, there's been a lot of conflict with the Skaarj and sure... they kinda like eating humans, but can't we just get past that?

Can't we all just get along??

item.title: PSA: Epic Games Forums Hacked
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded:
On July 14th Epic Games forums were hacked resulting in a hacker gaining access to all the information stored in the database.

The data the hacker gained access to includes: your email, date of birth and password which we know was only an MD5 of an MD5+SALT of your password which means there is a chance your password has been decrypted.

If you use the same password in other locations, especially your email account it is suggested you change your password as quickly as possible.

Like me...

PSA: Epic Games Forums Hacked

item.title: 17 Years of Unreal Tournament
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded:
Today it is hard not to think of how the time has flown. 17 years ago, Unreal Tournament was unleashed on the world beginning a new age of multiplayer gaming. It's not that multiplayer games didn't exist before 1999. They absolutely did. But in 1999, games went from including multiplayer as an afterthought because it was complicated to configure and use to being a primary focus and the selling point of many games. Sure, Unreal and Half Life had fairly simple to use multiplayer. But neither...

17 Years of Unreal Tournament

item.title: New DooM game
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNite)
item.dc:creator: NeoNite
item.content:encoded:
Here's a long trailer of the new Doom game, shown at E3. Looks like it could be fun.



Couple of quick observations:
- chainsaw seems a bit too powerfull?
- There's no need for a slowdown when you switch to another weapon
- As a nice nostalgic wink; include an optional statusbar (or just the face) someone could probably, if possible, mod that in.
But it's still early; Realse if I'm not mistaken would be for spring next year.
